name: Figma Chinese Rename
description:
This is a plugin for Chinese users to rename their layers by English, which will make their naming convention more reasonable.
We provide a word-bank used frequently in digital design so you can search it in Chinese and get a English word to rename your layers. If you can't find it in word-bank it will return translated word by Google.
